DOC.HEADLINE: RIVAL AFGHAN FIGHTING SPREADS
DOC.TEXT: Fighting among rival Afghan factions seeking power in Kabul spread to three northern provinces Saturday as the struggle entered its third week , Afghan sources in Pakistan said . Each side claimed victories in the Afghan capital itself , where jets from opposing sides bombed enemy positions during ground fighting , the sources said . Forces loyal to President Burhanuddin Rabbani and his opponents were also engaged in new fighting in the northern provinces of Samangan , Jozjan and Balkh , they added .
